hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | python3 -c "import json,sys; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print(d.get(\"file_path\",\"\"))" 2>/dev/null); [ -z "$FILE" ] && exit 0; case "$FILE" in *.json) jq empty "$FILE" 2>&1 && echo "✓ valid JSON: $FILE" || echo "✗ invalid JSON: $FILE" ;; *.sh) bash -n "$FILE" 2>&1 && echo "✓ valid shell: $FILE" || echo "✗ invalid shell: $FILE" ;; *.yaml) python3 -c "import yaml,sys; list(yaml.safe_load_all(open(sys.argv[1])))" "$FILE" 2>&1 && echo "✓ valid YAML: $FILE" || echo "✗ invalid YAML: $FILE" ;; esac'
